excerpt.rendered: We are seeking a meticulous and proactive Research Analyst (CD / CDQA) to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for gathering, analysing, and managing data to provide insights into client needs, preferences, and market trends. This role involves conducting research analysis, contact discovery, and market analysis. An excellent opportunity for entry-level candidates interested in data analysis in IT sector.
